serviceprofile.title: Proposed FMN Spiral 4 Virtual Appliance Interchange Serviceprofile

description.para: The Virtual Appliance Interchange Profile defines the standard format for exchanging virtual appliances between different host platforms.
The following standards are mandated for the exchange of virtual appliances within the Mission Network.

guide.para:
To ensure optimization of the exchange of virtual appliances, the following guidelines should be observed.
Minimize the VMsâ€™ HDD footprint to a minimum and use thin provisioning
Unmount any removable devices before exporting to OVF
Delete all snapshots
Shutdown machine
Include a CRC Integrity Check.

The platform should be able to support the following minimalistic set of hardware features:
vCPU support: min 2 vCPU supported per VM
SCSI disk controller: min 2
Virtual SCSI harddisks and optical disk: min 8
IDE nodes
Virtual IDE disks
Virtual IDE CD-ROMs
E1000 (Network Interface)
SVGA displays: min 1
Serial ports: min 1
